feats.name: Power Attack
feats.description: You unleash a particularly powerful attack that clobbers your foe but leaves you a bit unsteady. Make a Strike. This counts as two attacks for your multiple attack penalty. If this Strike hits, you deal an extra die of weapon damage.

feats.name: Double Slice
feats.description: You lash out with both weapons. Make two Strikes, one with each of your two melee weapons, each using your current multiple attack penalty.

feats.name: Combat Reflexes
feats.description: You can react more quickly than others. You gain a second reaction each round that you can use only to make an Attack of Opportunity.

inventory.name: Adventurer's Pack
inventory.description: Includes backpack, bedroll, 10 pieces of chalk, flint and steel, 50 feet of rope, 2 weeks' rations, soap, 5 torches, and a waterskin

notes.title: First Dungeon
notes.content: We explored the ruins of the old temple today. Found several traps and a hidden chamber with ancient scrolls. The party decided to camp in the entrance hall for the night.

notes.title: Meeting with the Guild
notes.content: Met with the Adventurer's Guild representative. They offered us a new contract to investigate strange occurrences in the northern forest. Payment is 500 gold upon completion.
